DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Rimonabant Efficacy Insulin-Treated Diabetic Patients ( ARPEGGIO )
DOC.detailed_description: The total duration study 360 day include screening period ( 14 day ) double-blind treatment period ( approximately 11 month ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age great equal 18 year . Diagnosis type 2 diabetes define WHO criterion . Type 2 diabetes treat insulin least 3 month ( insulin dose least 30 U/day least 4 week ) . HbA1C great equal 7 % . Having sign informed consent form . General : Weight loss > 5 kg within 3 month prior screen visit . Pregnancy lactation . Absence medically approve contraceptive method female childbearing potential . Administration investigational drug within 30 day prior screen visit . Previous participation Rimonabant study . Presence history allergic reaction intolerance multiple drug . Related endocrine metabolic disorder : Presence clinically significant endocrine disease accord Investigator.Note : euthyroid patient replacement therapy include dosage thyroxine stable least 3 month prior screen visit . Fasting Cpeptide < 1.0 ng/mL . Related disorder : Presence severe medical psychological condition opinion Investigator would compromise patient 's safety successful participation study . Presence history cancer within past 5 year exception adequately treat localized basal cell skin cancer situ uterine cervical cancer . Related laboratory finding : Positive test hepatitis B surface antigen and/or hepatitis C antibody . Abnormal TSH level ( TSH > ULN < LLN ) . Positive urine pregnancy test . Related previous concomitant medication : Antidiabetic drug insulin within 3 month prior screen visit . Drugs affect weight ( e.g. , sibutramine , orlistat , herbal preparation , etc ) .
